title: Renowned producer Ryan Murphy heads to Netflix
text:
Renowned producer Ryan Murphy heads to Netflix 3:19pm GMT - 00:55 
Ryan Murphy, the acclaimed producer of ‘American Horror Story’, ‘Glee’, and ‘Nip/Tuck, has signed a five-year deal with Netflix worth up to $300 million. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Ryan Murphy, the acclaimed producer of ‘American Horror Story’, ‘Glee’, and ‘Nip/Tuck, has signed a five-year deal with Netflix worth up to $300 million. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2stzkiR
